ThingDef.label: guard flak armor
ThingDef.description: Flak armor is a light and relatively simple form of body armor used by the military forces of the Imperium of Man. It is relatively cheap and easy to produce on an average Imperial world. Usually flak armor consists of a skeleton, composed of flexible, lightweight metals. The skeleton is wrapped in several layers of ablative, shock-resistant materials and ballistic textiles. Once multiple layers of fabric are affixed to the skeleton, the armor is given its toughened outer shell. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.

ThingDef.label: guard flak vest
ThingDef.description: Flak vest is a light and relatively simple form of body armor used by the military forces of the Imperium of Man. It is relatively cheap and easy to produce on an average Imperial world. Usually flak vest consists of a skeleton, composed of flexible, lightweight metals. The skeleton is wrapped in several layers of ablative, shock-resistant materials and ballistic textiles. Once multiple layers of fabric are affixed to the skeleton, the vest is given its toughened outer shell. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.

ThingDef.label: guard carapace armor
ThingDef.description: Carapace armor is a significantly heavier variant of flak armor most commonly issued to stormtroopers and commissars. In some rare cases, it can be worn by Planetary Defense Force troops. Carapace armor has noticeably better protective capabilities; however, it comes with the caveat of higher mass and no power assistance, thus tiring out the wearer much faster, compared to flak or power armor. The largest issue with the mass-scale production of carapace armor is its cost.

ThingDef.label: guard flak helmet
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue helmet commonly used by Astra Militarum regiments across the entire galaxy. Its design may vary, but the main principle remains the same: a relatively light and flexible metal base, coated with several layers of ablative and shock-absorbing materials, as well as ballistic textiles. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.

ThingDef.label: guard flak helmet with goggles
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue helmet commonly used by Astra Militarum regiments across the entire galaxy. Its design may vary, but the main principle remains the same: a relatively light and flexible metal base, coated with several layers of ablative and shock-absorbing materials, as well as ballistic textiles. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.\n\nThis particular helmet has a pair of ballistic goggles attached to it.

ThingDef.label: guard full helmet
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue carapace helmet commonly used by Astra Militarum stormtroopers and Tempestus Scions across the entire galaxy. This type of protective gear utilizes ceramite plates molded into the standard flak helmet design, resulting in increased protective capabilities at the expense of greater weight and production costs. Typically, a carapace helmet is equipped with an encrypted vox micro-bead, a rebreather and a portable light source.

ThingDef.label: guard full helmet (no logo)
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue carapace helmet commonly used by Astra Militarum stormtroopers and Tempestus Scions across the entire galaxy. This type of protective gear utilizes ceramite plates molded into the standard flak helmet design, resulting in increased protective capabilities at the expense of greater weight and production costs. Typically, a carapace helmet is equipped with an encrypted vox micro-bead, a rebreather and a portable light source.\n\nThis particular helmet has no Imperial Aquila, for whatever reason.

ThingDef.label: guard uniform
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue Astra Militarum uniform, consisting of a jacket and a pair of pants. It's made from a material sturdy enough to withstand wear and tear as well as grime. It also provides sufficient insulation for the wearer and doesn't restrict movement. The uniform itself can vary, depending on the world and even the regiment itself.

ThingDef.label: rebreather mask
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue rebreather mask commonly used by Astra Militarum soldiers in difficult conditions, such as low oxygen environments, or contaminated areas. This mask provides very little protection against physical damage, but it is capable of protecting its wearer from toxic gases.

ThingDef.label: guard flak helmet with rebreather
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue helmet commonly used by Astra Militarum regiments across the entire galaxy. Its design may vary, but the main principle remains the same: a relatively light and flexible metal base, coated with several layers of ablative and shock-absorbing materials, as well as ballistic textiles. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.\n\nThis particular helmet has a pair of ballistic goggles and a rebreather attached to it.
